prTitle: feat: initialize Vite + React project structure for lingerie website
prBody:
## Summary

Completed the initial Vite + React project setup for the lingerie website as specified in issue #64. This establishes the foundational project structure following the architectural decisions outlined in the planning documents.

### Key Features Implemented

**Project Setup & Configuration:**
- ✅ Vite + React 19 + TypeScript setup
- ✅ ESLint and Prettier configuration for code quality
- ✅ Project folder structure following architectural patterns

**Routing & Navigation:**
- ✅ React Router v7 setup with client-side routing
- ✅ Layout component with header/footer structure
- ✅ Home page, Product Detail page, and 404 error handling

**Component Architecture:**
- ✅ Reusable UI components (Button, Card, Grid)
- ✅ Product-specific components (ProductCard, ProductGrid)
- ✅ Layout components (Header, Footer, Layout)

**Styling & Design:**
- ✅ CSS Modules setup for component-scoped styling
- ✅ Global CSS reset and responsive utilities
- ✅ Mobile-first responsive design patterns

**Data Layer:**
- ✅ TypeScript type definitions for Product and Category
- ✅ Static JSON data structure with 5 sample products
- ✅ Data service layer with utility functions
- ✅ Categories and product metadata structure

**Quality Assurance:**
- ✅ All linting rules pass (ESLint)
- ✅ Code formatting consistent (Prettier)
- ✅ TypeScript compilation successful
- ✅ Production build process validated
- ✅ Development server starts correctly

### Technical Implementation

The project follows a static site architecture as specified:
- Client-side only (no backend)
- Component-based React architecture
- CSS Modules for styling
- Static JSON data storage
- Type-safe TypeScript implementation

### Testing & Verification

**Build Status:** ✅ Passing  
**Lint Status:** ✅ No errors or warnings  
**Format Status:** ✅ All files properly formatted  
**TypeScript:** ✅ Type-safe compilation  
**Dev Server:** ✅ Starts successfully on http://localhost:5173/  
**Production Build:** ✅ Generates optimized bundle (237KB gzipped: 76KB)

### Dependencies Installed

**Runtime:**
- React 19.2.0 + React DOM 19.2.0
- React Router DOM 7.13.0

**Development:**
- Vite 7.2.4 + TypeScript 5.9.3
- ESLint 9.39.1 + Prettier 3.8.1
- Complete type definitions for all dependencies

### Next Steps

This establishes the foundation for Sprint 1. Ready for additional features:
- Global styles and design system
- Data layer enhancements
- UI component library expansion
- Layout component improvements

Closes #64
